name: 1Minute Hero
description:
Game engine final project

Credit : Myungsub Eum, Joonyoung Sun

Git: https://github.com/TeddyUm/GameEngineFinal/

* How to play

WASD key - Move

Option - Save, volume

Random encounter

Village - HP, MP restore

Item - Time extend, HP, MP restore, EXP get

Time limit : 1 minute
